text: Liacaridae is a family of mites in the order Oribatida. There are about 7 genera and more than 240 described species in Liacaridae. Xenillus ==Genera== These seven genera belong to the family Liacaridae: * Adoristes Hull, 1916 * Birsteinius Krivolutsky, 1965 * Dorycranosus Woolley, 1969 * Opsioristes Woolley, 1967 * Planoristes Iturrondobeitia & Subías, 1978 * Xenillus Robineau-Desvoidy, 1839 * † Liacarus Michael, 1898 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * ==External links== * Category:Acariformes
title: Liacaridae
